personal.name: Pablo Beltran
personal.introdution: I'm a passionate Software Engineer from Ecuador who thrives in fast-paced environments, always striving to deliver high-quality solutions. In my free time, you can find me surfing, enjoying music, or practicing martial arts!

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Engineer

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
experiences.description: I juggled backend and frontend features that made life easier for users and advisors—like exportable profiles and localized skill suggestions. I also tightened security with encrypted configs via GCP, fine-tuned frontend performance, and boosted code health with SonarCloud.

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Engineer

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Contract)

experiences.title: Master in Business Intelligence & Data Analytics

projects.title: AstroText
